StudentManagement.title: Student Management
StudentManagement.description: View and manage all students on the platform.
StudentManagement.studentListDescription: A list of all the students in your organization.
StudentManagement.noPointHistory: No point history found for this user.
StudentManagement.noTestHistory: No test history found for this user.
StudentManagement.descriptionPoint: User-provided reason for the point adjustment.
StudentManagement.confirmDeleteDescription: This will permanently delete this student. This action cannot be undone.
StudentManagement.confirmResetPasswordDescription: This will send a password reset link to the user's email address. They will be prompted to create a new password.

notifications.deleteError: Failed to delete student. Please try again.
notifications.resetPasswordError: Failed to send password reset link.

form.addDialogDescription: Fill in the details to create a new student account.
form.adjustPointsDescription: Manually add or remove points from a student's balance. Use a negative number to subtract points.
form.reasonPlaceholder: e.g., Prize for competition, correction, etc.
form.pointLogDescription: A log of all point transactions for this user.
form.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
form.passwordConfirmMinLength: Password confirmation must be at least 8 characters.
form.reasonMinLength: Reason must be at least 5 characters long.
